odd.head: General note

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Paul Mellon Fellowship is offered to an unmarried member of the Senior Class in Yale College for study at Clare College, Cambridge, for the academic year.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The material consists of correspondence concerning the Paul Mellon Fellowship maintained by the master of Berkeley College, Yale University.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The materials are arranged by correspondent.
